IMAIL.CO.summary: InterMail A/S provides digital and paper-based marketing communication packages in the Nordic region and rest of Europe. It offers customer loyalty, and marketing and administrative communication solutions; and engages in relation and dialogue agency services, as well as handles and distributes campaign material. The company also provides RelationPlus, direct mail, and e-box solutions. The company was formerly known as National Industri A/S and changed its name to InterMail A/S in 2004. InterMail A/S was founded in 1977 and is based in Hvidovre, Denmark.
